title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

For Task A, the response must correctly identify the year with the lower turnout based on the graph.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe the relationship between total vote and voting-age population in Mexico between 1993 and 2017 based on the data in the graph.

For Task C, the response must correctly describe political participation.

For Task D, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about political participation in legislative elections in Mexico using the data in the graph.

For Task E, the response must correctly explain what the data imply about why democracies encourage political participation.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes all five of the tasks set by the question.
